price: обележено од твога Господара, а оно од неправедника није далеко.
arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَۖ وَمَا هِيَ مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِبَعِيدٖ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: musawwamatan ʿinda rabbika wamā hiya mina al-ẓālimīna bibaʿīdin
